overview: Alaav, is the story of Bhaveen Gossain, a 63-year-old son, taking care of Savitri, his ailing 95-year-old mother in their home nestled in a quiet suburb of New Delhi, India. Bhaveen rarely steps out of his house as he is completely devoted to looking after his mother. From waking up in the morning until going to sleep, Bhaveen is the sole caregiver for his mother, Savitri.
title: Hearth and Home

overview: A queer voyage along the labyrinths of dreams, archives and lived histories, Roohrangi navigates the real and the imaginary – traversing the filmmaker’s encounters in a gay-cruising forest-reserve as he retraces the memory of his grandfather’s leucoderma-ridden face. A face on whose white-and-brown patches, he saw a forest of miraculous trees.
title: Roohrangi

overview: Weighed down by familial expectations and personal despair, Sonu battles inner struggles while trying to find meaning in his fractured life.
title: Melting Man

overview: A young hacker Noor attempts to save her basti when they are scammed by a corrupt politician.
title: Hijabi Hacker

overview: Woven Dreams narrates the journey of Looms of Ladakh, a women-led cooperative founded in 2017. Empowering hundreds of women, it blends traditional textile crafts with modern design, fostering leadership, sustainable livelihoods, and cultural preservation, while striving to become a globally recognized ethical luxury brand.
title: Woven Dreams

original_title: Waiting At The Edge Of The Gallows
overview: Pawan Kumar, India’s last hangman from a lineage of executioners, gained fame after hanging the Nirbhaya case convicts. A media favorite, he is known for his blunt views on capital punishment and takes great pride in his legacy, which he hopes to pass to his son.
title: Waiting At The Edge Of The Gallows

overview: In Kibber, a remote Spiti Valley village, women once saw snow leopards as threats but now champion their conservation through the Nature Conservation Foundation. Trained in camera trapping and species tracking, the ‘Shen-mo’s’ balance wildlife protection with earning a livelihood.
title: Shen-Mo’s of Kibber

overview: Set in Gurugram, the film follows a community’s struggle for prayer spaces amid urban growth and resistance. As public spaces shrink, tensions rise between communities claiming them. Through intimate portraits, the documentary explores identity, faith, and belonging in an India increasingly marked by division and polarisation.
title: No Space To Pray

overview: Rooted in personal memory and quiet reflection, this documentary follows a young woman returning home to engage in intimate conversations with her family. Through shared stories residing in family archives, she confronts the gendered expectations of her childhood, unspoken struggles with identity, and the quiet resilience passed down through generations.
title: Little Things

overview: A boy wanders through his village carrying a colourless television – its blank screen mirroring the muted world around him. His search is not only for colour but for something deeper, something lost. Echoes of ancestral spirits, whispers of a dakan, and fragments of ritual blur the boundary between the living and the dead, the seen and the unseen.
title: Dakan

overview: A barber and his son have the ability to regrow hair in exchange for years from a person's life. The story features a divine barber and his apprentice in a realm of gods.
title: Barber of the Gods

overview: Four years after Babi's passing, her grandniece embarks on a journey to piece together the life of her great-aunt, an esteemed educator, filmmaker, and freedom fighter. This documentary explores intimate anecdotes shared by Babi's daughter and grandchildren, uncovering her philosophy and legacy. Set against the backdrop of India's political upheavals, the film reflects on how these events shaped Babi's life. The filmmaker delves into her personal and professional legacy—through her writings, objects, and creative works—to capture the essence of this remarkable woman. As she navigates her emotional journey, she seeks answers about her own future while discovering the profound impact Babi left on her family and the world. Through this exploration, the filmmaker not only uncovers Babi's legacy but also deepens her understanding of her own personal history.
title: Babi

overview: An uncomfortable journey of the widespread infrastructure development across India. The film gets its name from the Indian political philosophy of the ‘law of fish’ and shows us the negative consequences of rampant development and how it is affecting low-income groups.
title: The Law of the Fish

overview: In a landscape of shifting sands, a community enclosed into grids with no name, rehearses its music in villages like 1 PB, a dot at the Indian side of the India-Pakistan border. Mirs are the custodians and practitioners of a timeless poetry not bound to 'quam' or 'desh'. But the land has now degraded, boundaries have hardened and the music has become a whisper. This film gleans songs and poems to stitch a portrait of musicians struggling to keep their inheritance of Sufi and Bhakti music alive.
title: Music In A Village Named 1PB

overview: On the morning of her birthday, a teenager’s accidental discovery of pleasure cracks open a world of unspoken desires within her seemingly conservative Indian household, forcing her and her mother onto unexpected paths.
title: The Itch

overview: Vishnu Das is a local guide who becomes driven by a curiosity to uncover the true history behind the iconic Taj Mahal monument.
title: The Taj Story

overview: Shazia Bano takes her husband Abbas to court after he abandons her and their children, sparking a national battle over faith, women’s rights, and justice. Inspired by the landmark Supreme Court judgement of Mohd. Ahmed Khan vs. Shah Bano Begum, Haq is the story of one woman’s fight for her rights and justice.
title: Haq

overview: Ashish confronts the ultimate challenge of his age-gap romance as he visits Ayesha's family home.
title: De De Pyaar De 2

overview: These movies are based on the research of changes in humans due to Vedic changes born in humans over time.
title: Yugantar

overview: Three frustrated husbands seek freedom from their dull marriages. A wild idea promises escape and excitement. But what follows is anything but expected.
title: Mastiii 4

overview: Two siblings escape into a world of adventure aboard a broken ship—until growing up starts to pull them apart.
title: Small Clouds

overview: Shankar and Mukti's intense love story unfolds against the backdrop of Benaras, exploring surrender and transformation through an all-consuming romance that heals, hurts, and changes them
title: Tere Ishk Mein

overview: Set in the world of Indian intelligence, Dhurandhar follows a covert officer on a high-stakes mission rooted in historical events. The film blends high-octane action sequences, Shakespearean betrayals, and intricate espionage tradecraft, centered on the lives of the unknown men.
title: Dhurandhar

overview: Set against the backdrop of the 1971 war, follows the life of second Lieutenant Arun Khetrapal.
title: Ikkis

overview: Two fierce female agents tackle dangerous missions in a thrilling world of espionage, as they navigate perilous situations, execute daring stunts, and face unexpected turns in this action-packed adventure.
title: Alpha

original_title: तू मेरी मैं तेरा मैं तेरा तू मेरी
overview: Love story movie releasing in 2026
title: Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri

overview: Ten Friends Navigate Their Complex Lives Grappling With Mental Health Issues , Trauma And Personal Struggles As They Try To Find Hope And Resilience In The Face Of Adversity
title: UKV's Dandelions

original_title: Oh Laila Tere Peeche Padd Gaye Apni Jaan Nisaar Kar Gaye
overview: 3 Majnus And 33 Lailas !!!!!!  Just Imagine The Chaos................
title: Oh Laila Tere Peeche Padd Gaye Apni Jaan Nisaar Kar Gaye

original_title: Haye Hukku Haye Hukku Haaye Haaye Haaye
overview: Daksh and Insha Are Close Friends Who Have Never Seen Each Other Romantically, But Their Families Misinterpret Their Bond And Arrange Their Engagement  Desperate To Escape , They Make A Dramatic Announcement - Daksh Declares That He Is Gay, While Insha A Lesbian - And The Engagement Is Immediately Called Off Leaving Their Families In Shock , What Begins As A Silly Plan To Avoid Marriage Slowly Backfires When Daksh And Insha, Spending More Time Together Amidst The Chaos , Begin To Develop Real Feelings Now Trapped By Their Own Lie , They Must Find The Courage To Confess Both The Truth And Their Love Turning The Raita They Created Into A Happily-Ever-After
title: Haye Hukku Haye Hukku Haaye Haaye Haaye

overview: Get Ready For The Ultimate Adventure "Jee Le Zaraa" Join The Journey Of Friendship , Self-Discovery And Thrilling Experiences With Laughter , Excitement And Unforgettable Moments , This Series Will Take You On A Ride Of A Lifetime
title: Jim Jam Jelly

overview: An AI-generated film about the Hindu god Hanuman; it will draw from the sacred texts of Indian epic 'Ramayana' and Puranic literature to create what producers describe as an “awe-inspiring, visual odyssey designed to be enjoyed as a shared experience in theaters.”
title: Chiranjeevi Hanuman: The Eternal

original_title: Hai Jawani Toh Ishq Hona Hai
overview: A comic entertainer.
title: Hai Jawani Toh Ishq Hona Hai

original_title: नागज़िला: नाग लोक का पहला कांड
overview: The first chapter of a high-concept creature comedy trilogy, where an ordinary man's life takes a wild turn when he encounters a cunning, mystical snake-leading to an unpredictable battle of wits, chaos, and laughter.
title: Naagzilla: Naag Lok Ka Pehla Kaand

overview: A love story set against the backdrop of a war.
title: Love and War

overview: First part of the epic Ramayana Duology.
title: Ramayana: Part One

overview: Mr. Teacher, a quiet and principled schoolteacher, is devastated after losing his only child in a tragic road accident. The very same day, at the accident site, he comes across another injured boy-abandoned, nameless, and unconscious. Everyone around looks the other way, but Mr. Teacher steps in to help. As he nurses the boy back to health, he discovers the child is a victim of a deeper evil-caught in the clutches of a trafficking network. What begins as an act of kindness becomes a mission of justice.
title: BAHUBURA

overview: The eighth installment in the Maddock Supernatural Cinematic Universe. Plot TBA.
title: Stree 3

overview: The thirteenth installment in the Maddock Supernatural Cinematic Universe. Plot TBA.
title: Bhediya 2:  The Beginning of End

overview: Final part of the epic Ramayana Duology.
title: Ramayana: Part Two

overview: The seventh installment in the Maddock Supernatural Cinematic Universe. Plot TBA.
title: Chamunda

overview: Mahavatar tells the epic story of Parashurama, the immortal warrior of dharma from Hindu mythology, whose journey spans ages as he upholds righteousness against the forces of darkness.
title: Mahavatar

overview: The ninth installment in the Maddock Supernatural Cinematic Universe. Plot TBA.
title: Maha Munjya

overview: The tenth installment in the Maddock Supernatural Cinematic Universe. Plot TBA.
title: Pehla Mahayudh

overview: The eleventh installment in the Maddock Supernatural Cinematic Universe. Plot TBA.
title: Doosara Mahayudh

overview: Vann Turn follows the riveting journey of an intense drama set in a world where survival is a constant battle. The film explores the lives of its characters as they face unforeseen challenges, with their destinies intertwining in a web of suspense and intrigue. A group of individuals finds themselves trapped in an unforgiving situation, where every decision could be their last. As secrets unfold and truths come to light, the boundaries between right and wrong blur, leading to shocking consequences. Set against a backdrop of power struggles, deceit, and personal vendettas, Vann Turn pushes its characters to their breaking points. The film is directed by Harsh Gogi, known for his ability to create suspenseful narratives, and promises a gripping experience that keeps the audience on the edge of their seats.
title: VANN TURN
